title: The Art Of War GN (2012) (FlameFox)
description:
The Art of War

Written by Kelly Roman and illustrated by Michael DeWeese, The Art of War is a comic book published by Harpercollins in 2012.

Filetype: .cbz
348 pages

This gritty two-color graphic novel integrates the iconic strategy text by Sun Tzu into a sweeping adventure story set 20 years in the future when Wall Street is militarized and China is the world's dominant economy. KR was sent to prison for a friendly fire incident which left his unit in tatters. Upon release he learns that his brother was brutally murdered while serving as a financial analyst under the brilliant mogul Sun Tzu, a modern incarnation of the ancient master. He heads into Manhattan to get inside Sun Tzu's organization and find out who killed his brother and why.
